016package io.micronaut.maven.openapi;
017
018import io.micronaut.openapi.generator.MicronautCodeGeneratorBuilder;
019import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.LifecyclePhase;
020import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
021import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
022
023import java.util.List;
024
025/**
026 * Generates an OpenAPI client.
027 * The sources are generated in the target directory.
028 */
029@Mojo(name = OpenApiClientMojo.MOJO_NAME, defaultPhase = LifecyclePhase.GENERATE_SOURCES)
030public class OpenApiClientMojo extends AbstractOpenApiMojo {
031    public static final String MOJO_NAME = "generate-openapi-client";
032    private static final String CLIENT_PREFIX = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".client.";
033
034    /**
035     * Client id.
036     */
037    @Parameter(property = CLIENT_PREFIX  + "id", defaultValue = "")
038    protected String clientId;
039
040    /**
041     * Whether to configure authentication for client.
042     */
043    @Parameter(property = CLIENT_PREFIX + "use.auth", defaultValue = "false")
044    protected boolean useAuth;
045
046    /**
047     * Additional annotations to be used on the generated client API classes.
048     */
049    @Parameter(property = CLIENT_PREFIX + "additional.type.annotations")
050    protected List<String> additionalTypeAnnotations;
051
052    /**
053     * The base path separator.
054     */
055    @Parameter(property = CLIENT_PREFIX + "base.path.separator")
056    protected String basePathSeparator;
057
058    /**
059     * The pattern for authorization filter.
060     */
061    @Parameter(property = CLIENT_PREFIX + "authorization.filter.pattern")
062    protected String authorizationFilterPattern;
063
064    /**
065     * The property that defines if this mojo is used.
066     */
067    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_OPENAPI_PREFIX + ".generate.client")
068    protected boolean enabled;
069
070    /**
071     * Determines if the client should use lombok.
072     * @since 4.2.2
073     */
074    @Parameter(property = CLIENT_PREFIX + "lombok")
075    protected boolean lombok;
076
077    /**
078     * Determines if the client should use flux for arrays.
079     * @since 4.2.2
080     */
081    @Parameter(property = CLIENT_PREFIX + "flux.for.arrays")
082    protected boolean fluxForArrays;
083
084    /**
085     * If set to true, the `javax.annotation.Generated` annotation will be added to all generated classes.
086     * @since 4.2.2
087     */
088    @Parameter(property = CLIENT_PREFIX + "generated.annotation", defaultValue = "true")
089    protected boolean generatedAnnotation;
090
091    @Override
092    protected boolean isEnabled() {
093        return enabled;
094    }
095
096    @Override
097    protected void configureBuilder(MicronautCodeGeneratorBuilder builder) {
098        if ("java".equalsIgnoreCase(lang)) {
099            builder.forJavaClient(spec -> {
100                spec.withAuthorization(useAuth);
101                if (clientId != null && !clientId.isEmpty()) {
102                    spec.withClientId(clientId);
103                }
104                if (additionalTypeAnnotations != null) {
105                    spec.withAdditionalClientTypeAnnotations(additionalTypeAnnotations);
106                }
107                if (basePathSeparator != null) {
108                    spec.withBasePathSeparator(basePathSeparator);
109                }
110                if (authorizationFilterPattern != null) {
111                    spec.withAuthorizationFilterPattern(authorizationFilterPattern);
112                }
113                spec.withLombok(lombok);
114                spec.withFluxForArrays(fluxForArrays);
115                spec.withGeneratedAnnotation(generatedAnnotation);
116            });
117        } else if ("kotlin".equalsIgnoreCase(lang)) {
118            builder.forKotlinClient(spec -> {
119                spec.withAuthorization(useAuth);
120                if (clientId != null && !clientId.isEmpty()) {
121                    spec.withClientId(clientId);
122                }
123                if (additionalTypeAnnotations != null) {
124                    spec.withAdditionalClientTypeAnnotations(additionalTypeAnnotations);
125                }
126                if (basePathSeparator != null) {
127                    spec.withBasePathSeparator(basePathSeparator);
128                }
129                if (authorizationFilterPattern != null) {
130                    spec.withAuthorizationFilterPattern(authorizationFilterPattern);
131                }
132                spec.withFluxForArrays(fluxForArrays);
133                spec.withGeneratedAnnotation(generatedAnnotation);
134            });
135        } else {
136            throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Unsupported language:" + lang);
137        }
138    }
139}
